Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: Aussie people need some major household assistance as the cost of living continues to shoot up. Recent reports are warning mortgage holders to brace up and get ready for another interest rate hike even though the inflation peak seems to have calmed down a bit. Additionally people residing in social or remote areas are getting no support from the subsidy of electricity meters. Rent is going up at an alarming rate and Qlders are the worst hit paying high amounts for electricity and food bills. However the country's official inflation figures show that price growth has slowed down a bit and there's hope to see some relief in the near future.
